About ShareX

ShareX is a free and open-source screen capture and file sharing tool. It offers a wide range of capture methods and powerful upload options.

Key Features

  • Multiple capture methods (fullscreen, window, region)
  • Screen recording
  • Color picker and ruler tools
  • Image editing and annotation
  • Upload to 80+ destinations
  • Custom workflows and hotkeys

Available Platforms

  • Windows

Pricing

Free and Open Source
